word:
I saw that special efforts should be made in the West with tents; for the angels of God are preparing minds there to 
                                                                           149
receive the truth. This is why God has moved on some in the East to move to the West. Their gifts can accomplish more in the West than in the East. The burden of the work is in the West, and it is of the greatest importance that the servants of God should move in His opening providence.
